title: Can't open league of legends (Mac OS X Yosemite)
body:
Whenever i try to open it the "League of Legends" icon appears and stays there in the middle of my screen for several minutes. Nothing appears in my dock and after a while the application closes itself. Ive had this problem for about 5 days now trying to fix it. I decided to reinstall lol, however the website link for downloading the game doesnt work and presents an error webpage. I decided to get the dmg file off one of my friends and downloaded lol. When i try to open it and patch it the same problem occurs and says sometimes that there is an unspecified error. I have already changed my DNS to google but dont know what else i can do to fix this problem...

SOME ONE PLEASE HELP ME!!!!

replies.body:
Did you ever find a solution to this problem? 

I am currently experiencing the exact same problem. 

Thanks

This sounds like a connection issue, could you possibly take your Mac to a friends house and try to set it up there?. This would objectively tell you if its your internet, your computer or League of Legends RADS client.

-SumCoolAid
